content: every sock knitter will have a go-to vanilla sock recipe i mostly eschew patterned socks and almost always knit my socks cuff-down with a fish lips kiss heel by sox therapist and a wedge toe this pattern explains how i knit my socks vanilla socks are perfect for showing off your beautiful hand dyed skeins and provide a cozy and useful fo they also make a fantastic gift although be careful once folks try a hand knit sock they ll want more
